DOC.brief_summary: There increase evidence skeletal muscle lipid content ( IntraMyoCellular Lipid , IMCL ) markedly increase risk metabolic complication , include insulin resistance cardiovascular event . The investigator hypothesize skeletal muscle passively take FFAs availability high , thereby lead increase storage . To test hypothesis , investigator want manipulate FFA level , mean exercise , monitor intramuscular lipid content . Therefore objective examine effect exercise-induced elevation FFA skeletal muscle lipid content healthy lean men . To end , skeletal muscle lipid content investigate baseline exercise protocol four-hour recovery period exercise , condition high FFA concentration , low FFA concentration . To achieve high- versus low FFA concentration , exercise protocol chosen participant perform protocol glucose supplementation without . Skeletal muscle lipid content determine , directly exercise 4 h post exercise ( muscle biopsy ) without glucose supplementation .
DOC.brief_title: Elevated FFA Skeletal Muscle Lipid Content
DOC.criteria: Male sex Age 1830 year Lean , BMI 1825 kg/m2 Healthy Stable dietary habit No medication use Female sex Engagement program exercise > 2 hour total per week Cardiac problem , angina pectoris , cardiac infarction arrhythmia First degree relatives type 2 diabetes mellitus Any medical condition require treatment and/or medication use Unstable body weight ( weight gain loss > 3 kg past three month ) Participation biomedical study within 1 month prior screen visit Subjetcs , want inform unexpected medical finding , wish treat physician inform , participate study
